name: rili-server
description: The server side code for Rili

scripts.start:server:api: npm run start:postgres && ../node_modules/.bin/pm2 start pm2/ecosystem.config.js --only rili-server-api --env production
scripts.start:server:api:dev: npm run start:postgres:dev && npm run build:dev && ../node_modules/.bin/nodemon build/server-api.js --withSQLLogs
scripts.start:server:socketio: npm run start:redis && ../node_modules/.bin/pm2 start pm2/ecosystem.config.js --only rili-server-socket-io --env production
scripts.start:server:socketio:dev: npm run start:redis:dev && npm run build:dev && ../node_modules/.bin/nodemon --watch src --watch build build/server-socket-io.js withAllLogs
scripts.run:postgres: docker run --name rili-postgres -d -p 127.0.0.1:7432:5432 -e POSTGRES_USER=riliAdmin -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=secret -d postgres:latest
scripts.run:postgres:dev: docker run --name rili-postgres-dev -d -p 127.0.0.1:7432:5432 -e POSTGRES_USER=riliAdmin -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=secret postgres:latest
scripts.run:redis: docker run --name rili-redis-pub -d -p 17771:6379 redis:5.0.3 && docker run --name rili-redis-sub -d -p 17772:6379 redis:5.0.3
scripts.run:redis:dev: docker run --name rili-redis-pub-dev -d -p 17771:6379 redis:5.0.3 && docker run --name rili-redis-sub-dev -d -p 17772:6379 redis:5.0.3
scripts.run:redis:cli: docker run -it --link rili-redis-dev:redis --name rili-redis-cli --rm redis redis-cli -h redis -p 16379:6379
scripts.start:redis: docker start rili-redis-pub && docker start rili-redis-sub
scripts.start:redis:dev: docker start rili-redis-pub-dev && docker start rili-redis-sub-dev
scripts.stop:redis: docker stop rili-redis-pub && docker stop rili-redis-sub
scripts.stop:redis:dev: docker stop rili-redis-pub-dev && docker stop rili-redis-sub-dev
scripts.test: npm run lint:fix && echo "Error: no test specified" && exit 0

author: Rili, Inc.
